author: Electricks94
body:
This PR extends the `ConstDescriptor` and the `Descriptor`-struct of the `SoALayout` by an `std::tuple` `parameterTypes`, which holds `SoAConstParametersImpl` and `SoAParametersImpl` respectively. Before this information was only available by calling `SoA::ParametersTypeOf_COLOMNNAME`. This means it was only available by name and it was not possible to iterate over this information.

Also at the moment the  `ConstDescriptor` and the `Descriptor`-struct hold colomn information wrapped in `std::span`, where for example the `scalar`-type information of `Eigen`-objects is extracted. This means it is not possible to get back to the original `Eigen`-object that is defined as `SOA_COLOMN`. The information like the number of rows can not be obtained in this way.

To the PR a SoA copy example is added as test case, which copies two smaller Collections to a larger one. The idea for the copy method, which unrolls the colomns of the SoA at compile time, is taken from [SiPixelRecHitExtendedAlpaka](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/master/RecoLocalTracker/SiPixelRecHits/plugins/alpaka/SiPixelRecHitExtendedAlpaka.cc)

FYI @felicepantaleo @borzari
title: Extension of SoA Descriptors
